item.title: Postgres.app 2.8.4
item.description:
PostgreSQL beta versions usually introduce incompatible on-disk data formats.

Do not install this update if you need to access databases created with PostgreSQL 18beta1.

If you want to keep your 18beta1 servers, be sure to dump your databases before installing this upgrade. Servers created with 18beta2 are compatible with 18beta3. Released versions (PostgreSQL 13-17) use a stable data format and can always be updated to new minor versions without the need for dump/restore.

  • PostgreSQL 13.21 with PostGIS 3.1.12
  • PostgreSQL 14.18 with PostGIS 3.2.8
  • PostgreSQL 15.13 with PostGIS 3.3.8
  • PostgreSQL 16.9 with PostGIS 3.4.4
  • PostgreSQL 17.5 with PostGIS 3.5.2
  • PostgreSQL 18beta2 with PostGIS 3.6.0alpha1

You can find more info on the Github Releases Page.
